hobby.description: I try and sometimes manage to read a book every 2 weeks; hope that in the future I will have more spare time as reading is one of my favourite things to do

hobby.hobbyType: Organising holidays in my circle of friends
hobby.description: As someone who has an everyday to-do list, I like to do things on time, so going in a holiday with my friends is one of the best opportunities to show off my organisational skills.
I can stay hours and hours solving puzzles without getting bored. It rarely happens for me to give up on solving a puzzle and be distracted by something else.
Discovering new places, eat local food and take every single trip as the adventure odf my life; all of them make me want to travel as much as I can and I don't think I will ever stop doing it.
